column4: This is crazy. I am on a train running 150 km/h and connected via (E)GPRS/UMTS and NX rocks. NX is incredible
I am used to running ssh sessions over this link and it is extremely slow, but NX? It's almost just as sitting on a local console
are you using NoMachine FreeNX or 2X's implementation?
I am running 64bit natively, yes. But the nx server is running in a chroot jail
do you find the performance outweighs the difficulties? especially with binaries?
I had no difficulties with anything after I ditched freenx
does linux32 work for anything you might need?
so you haven't installed flash or any other closed source binaries or had any troubles with them?
I am running firefox with flash in 32bit jail. The flash plugin had to be copied to the firefox plugins directory manually.
it didnt work with apt-get. And I had to download the tarball from adobe and copy the plugin files manually
yeah nx is supposed to be usable over dialup with smoothscrolling enabled in browsers
can the server you're using access :0? or do you have to use a separate x session?
I am running X both in the native 64bit os and the chroot jail. Can use X both locally on the server and via NX
im asking if the nx client actually views the local display (as in display :0)or creates a new one
ahh.. it creates a new one
